member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateGlobals.ParsePartID(System.String)
member.summary: This method will parse the Part ID assigned to a component and return the Form Template Part ID Number within the Part ID
This method will load the controls for the specified parent control based on the form template information provided in the parameters.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateGlobals.LoadTabControl(System.Web.UI.ControlCollection,Aptify.Framework.FormTemplate.FormTemplatePartMetadata,System.Int32,System.Boolean,Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.AptifyFormTemplateContext,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method loads up a tab control based on the part meta-data provided in the Part parameter.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateGlobals.GetFormTemplateLayoutInfo(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.Int64,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns Web Layout information for a given form template ID, also can be obtained by using the Form Template Meta-Data Cache.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateGlobals.LoadFormTemplateLayoutObject(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method will instantiate an instance of WebFormTemplateLayout, or a sub-class, and return it. If the WebLayoutControlAssembly and WebLayoutControlClass fields of the Form Templates entity for the provided FormTemplateID are provided, then the method will attempt to instantiate the class based on the provided meta-data, otherwise the base WebFormTemplateLayout class will be returned.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateGlobals.LoadFormTemplateLayoutObject(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method will instantiate an instance of WebFormTemplateLayout, or a sub-class, and return it. If the WebLayoutControlAssembly and WebLayoutControlClass fields of the Form Templates entity for the provided AssemblyName and ClassName are provided, then the method will attempt to instantiate the class based on the provided meta-data, otherwise the base WebFormTemplateLayout class will be returned.

member.summary: This method will load up a sub-template from the meta-data provided

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateGlobals
member.summary: Aptify Form Template Shared Utility Class

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.ftCommon.GetContextTemplateID(Aptify.Framework.DataServices.IAptifyDataAction,System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Provides a Form Template ID for the current context (User and Group versus Global level).

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.ftCommon
member.summary: This class is designed to provide support/utility operations to other Form Template classes. This is publicly exposed for use outside of the FormTemplateControls assembly, however, it is not designed for use outside of the standard Aptify controls, so its future compatibility is NOT guaranteed as is the case with other Aptify public classes.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateTab.TabControl
member.summary: Reference to the internal AptifyWebTab control within the form template tab control

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateTab.RefreshDatabase
member.summary: If set to true the database is always refreshed when form template tabs are being loaded, if set to False then the cache is used when available

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateTab
member.summary: Aptify Web Form Template Tab Class - ASP.NET 2.0+ Server Control

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabInfo
member.summary: Tab Form Template Meta-Data Class for Internal Storage Purposes Only

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.AptifyFormTemplateHost.UseCache
member.summary: Determines the Caching behavior for the form template host.
member.remarks: If this is False then the Form Template Host does not Cache Form Templates. If it is true, then it does cache form Templates. The Form Template Metadata is cached regardless.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.AptifyFormTemplateHost.GetEntityFormTemplateID(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the Form Template ID from Cache, unless refresh cache is set to true.
member.param: Entity name for the Form Template
Refresh cache if you want the newest value.
member.returns: The Value of the Form Template ID as Long/ -1 if a Form Templated DNE.
member.remarks: The Form Template ID may be a stale value for it comes from cache. Only the cached item for the entity is reset if the bRefreshedCache value is set to true. All other cached items will not be affected.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.AptifyFormTemplateHost
member.summary: Web version of Aptify Form Template Host

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.Globals.GetFormTemplateCacheItem(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns a FormTemplateCache object for the provided entity name. If no entry previously existed in the cache, a new entry is created automatically, added to the cache and returned by this method. This method internally uses the FormTemplateCacheSingleton to handle the process specified.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.Globals.RemoveFromCache(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the item from cach using the entities name. This method internally uses the FormTemplateCacheSingleton to handle the process specified.
member.param: Name of Entity used as the key.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCacheSingleton.Items
member.summary: Collection of all cache items - do not edit this directly, used for read only access to current cache entries

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCacheSingleton.RemoveFromCash(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a cached Item from the cache by name.
member.param: Name of Entity, used as the key.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCacheSingleton.Item(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns a FormTemplateCache object for the provided entity name. If no entry previously existed in the cache, a new entry is created automatically, added to the cache and returned by this method.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCacheSingleton.Shutdown
member.summary: This method is called to dispose of all entries in the cache and to call the Dispose() method on each loaded form that exists within the cache and subsequently reset the internal cache singleton.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCacheSingleton
member.summary: This class is used to access the memory singleton instance of the template cache. The class is accessible publicly but only can be created from within the assembly.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCacheEntry
member.summary: This class is used to cache entries in the Form Template Cache

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.FormTemplateCache
member.summary: This class is used to register and retrieve cache entries for the form template caching system. It is setup as a sub-class of a the generic List collection class and caches form templates for a given entity. This class is available publicly but can only be instantiated from within the AptifyFormTemplateHost assembly.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.FillWidth
member.summary: This property determines if this element will automatically fill the width of the document window in the browser. The default value is False. Set this value to True in order to ensure proper sizing of the Form Template Layout control and its child controls

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.FillHeight
member.summary: This property determines if this element will automatically fill the height of the document window in the browser. The default value is False. Set this value to True in order to ensure proper sizing of the Form Template Layout control and its child controls

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.FillHeightMargin
member.summary: Only used if FillHeight=True, Specifies the number of pixels of space to between the bottom of the control and its parent's bottom edge

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.FillWidthMargin
member.summary: Only used if FillWidth=True, Specifies the number of pixles of space to leave at the right of the control between its right side and the right of its parent control

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.ApplicationObject
member.summary: Returns an instance of the AptifyApplication class

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.RefreshDatabase
member.summary: Determines if the Form Template Cache will be reloaded or not, Defaults to False

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.ReconstituteComponentCollection
member.summary: This method will rebuild the internal Form Component collection from the ASP.NET control hierarchy.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.FormTemplateMetaData
member.summary: Returns the meta-data for the currently loaded form template. This property is only available after FormComponentConfig() has been called.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.DoControlLoading(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method loads controls from the Form Template Layout meta-data definition

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.GetFormComponent(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String)
member.summary: Recursively finds the first instance of a control that has a specific name.
member.param: The first control to be checked.
The name of the control or a name of a datafield contained by an .
member.returns: The matching control if a match is found or nothing if a matching control is not found.
member.remarks: It will also look for datafield controls and attempt to match the datafield to the name. It will also look for SubType controls and attempt to match the SubTypeName to the name.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.IsFormComponent(System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: This method determines if the provided component is a valid Aptify Form Component, which is determined by checking to see if any of the following conditions is True: 1) Derived from WebFormCompnentBase 2) Implements IWebFormComponent 3) Derived from WebFormTemplateLayout 4) Derived from WebFormTemplateTab

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout.EnableFormComponent(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is responsible for enabling or disabling the specified control based on the name of the component or the data field. Internally implemented by calling GetFormComponent()
member.param: Name of the Control, or Data Field Name

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFormTemplateLayout
member.summary: Aptify Web Form Template Layout Class ASP.NET Server Control for displaying a form template

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
